meanings: (뒤쫓다) pursue, chase (after), run after, (흔적·증거 등을 이용해서) trail, track

meanings.meaning: one in chase of the other

vlive.korean: 희대의 사기꾼을 끝까지 쫓아서 잡으러 가는 그런 캐릭터인데요. He's a character who chases the con to the end. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 이병헌+강동원+김우빈 <마스터> 무비토크 라이브 ' Movie Talk Live'
vlive.english: He's a character who chases the con to the end.

vlive.korean: [다정하게 파리 쫓는 진영] 저리 가! [JINYOUNG is so sweet to the flies] Go away! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.10
vlive.english: [JINYOUNG is so sweet to the flies] Go away!

vlive.korean: 귀신 쫓는 영화 그거 뭐지? What's that movie where they chase ghosts? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 더비와 함께하는 BD🏹활
vlive.english: What's that movie where they chase ghosts?

vlive.korean: [서창빈은 황현진만 쫓는다!!] 황현진! [CHANGBIN looks for HYUNJIN] HYUNJIN! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [FULL]<찾았다 스트레이 키즈> 4화
그래서 알아보려고 저도 쫓아나간 거겠죠? So I guess I'm chasing after her to get to know her better? 듣기 View video BTOB : 비투비 - 비트콤 #96 (프니엘 'FLY23' M/V 비하인드)
vlive.english: So I guess I'm chasing after her to get to know her better?
